data.title: The British government has said that it will guarantee a legal right to high-speed internet for all homes and businesses in the U.K. by 2020.
Top EU Court Rules Uber Should Be Regulated Like a Taxi Company
South Korea fires 249 warning shots at Chinese ships suspected of carrying out illegal fishing in its waters
Vandals have partially destroyed a 115 million year old dinosaur footprint in a national park in Australia.
A baby has been born from an embryo frozen for nearly 25 years - possibly the longest gap between conception and birth since IVF began.
Nikki Haley warns allies Trump will take Jerusalem vote "personally"
Trump gives green light to selling lethal arms to Ukraine
Mexican journalist shot dead at son's school Christmas pageant
30,000 elephants killed in Africa in 2016, study finds
Theresa May's Top Brexit Ally Just Resigned Over Porn on His Parliamentary Computer
